content: Anyone have Peter Hendler's current email? He's just retired from KP and email to that address Peter.Hendler@kp.org was returned.
@Scott Robertson seems the most likely - Scott, do you know Peter's current email? can you send it to @David please
sorry, @Scott Robertson send it to @David Booth
You should be able to reach Peter at peter.hendler@gmail.com. I think he should also have an IHTSDO address, but I don't have it at the moment.
